thread.title: Cheap summer fares from National Express: 2 for 1 tickets to top attractions in London, Manchester and more
thread.title_full: Cheap summer fares from National Express: 2 for 1 tickets to top attractions in London, Manchester and more - Mirror Online

author: By Chantelle Symester
title: Cheap summer fares from National Express: 2 for 1 tickets to top attractions in London, Manchester and more
text:
If you're planning a summer staycation, or fancy a weekend getaway with the kids National Express are offering two for one deals on top attractions across the UK.
See the Arcelormittal Orbit in London , or take a Etihad Stadium tour to see th home of Manchester City FC .
To save the extra money simply book your coach journey via National Express online and then visit the 2-for-1 offers section , select your desired attraction and register to receive your money off voucher.
Take that voucher and your coach ticket with you upon entering the attraction to receive the discounts.
Top National Express 2 for 1 deals: Wiki Commons Legoland Discovery Centre Manchester
London - Harry Potter Bus and Walking Tours 2for1 £18.00
Birmingham - The National SeaLife Centre 2for1 £20.95
Manchester - LEGOLAND Discovery Centre 2for1 £18.95
Bristol - Bristol Pirate Walks 2for1 £7.50
